verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about when all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> who<WH834> were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> in the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> and in the lowland<WH8219> and on all<WH3605> the coast<WH2348> of the Great<WH1419> Sea<WH3220> toward<WH413> <WH4136> Lebanon,<WH3844> the Hittite<WH2850> and the Amorite,<WH567> the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> heard<WH8085> of it,
that they gathered<WH6908> themselves together<WH9191> with one<WH259> accord<WH6310> to fight<WH3898> with Joshua<WH3091> and with Israel.<WH3478>
When the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> heard<WH8085> what<WH834> Joshua<WH3091> had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and to Ai,<WH5857>

they also<WH1571> acted<WH6213> craftily<WH6195> and set<WH1980> out as envoys,<WH6737> and took<WH3947> worn-out sacks<WH8242> on their donkeys,<WH2543> and wineskins,<WH4997> worn-out and torn<WH1234> and mended,<WH9503>

and worn-out and patched<WH2921> sandals<WH5275> on their feet,<WH7272> and worn-out clothes<WH8008> on themselves; and all<WH3605> the bread<WH3899> of their provision<WH9479> was dry<WH3001> [and] had become<WH1961> crumbled.<WH5350>

And they went<WH1980> to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal,<WH1537> and said<WH559> to him and to the men<WH376> of Israel,<WH3478> "We have come<WH935> from a far<WH7350> country;<WH776> now<WH6258> therefore, make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us."

And the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to the Hivites,<WH2340> "Perhaps<WH194> you are living<WH3427> within<WH7130> our land;<WH7130> how<WH349> then shall we make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with you?"
But they said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "We are your servants.<WH5650>" Then Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to them, "Who<WH4310> are you, and where<WH370> do you come<WH935> from?"

And they said<WH559> to him, "Your servants<WH5650> have come<WH935> from a very<WH3966> far<WH7350> country<WH776> because of the fame<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> your God;<WH430> for we have heard<WH8085> the report<WH8089> of Him and all<WH3605> that He did<WH6213> in Egypt,<WH4714>

and all<WH3605> that He did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> who<WH834> were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon<WH2809> and to Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316> who<WH834> was at Ashtaroth.<WH6252>

"So our elders<WH2205> and all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of our country<WH776> spoke<WH559> to us, saying,<WH559> 'Take<WH3947> provisions<WH6720> in your hand<WH3027> for the journey,<WH1870> and go<WH1980> to meet<WH7122> them and say<WH559> to them, "We are your servants;<WH5650> now<WH6258> then, make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us."'

"This<WH2088> our bread<WH3899> [was] warm<WH2525> [when] we took<WH9480> it for our provisions<WH9480> out of our houses<WH1004> on the day<WH3117> that we left<WH3318> to come<WH1980> to you; but now<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> it is dry<WH3001> and has become<WH1961> crumbled.<WH5350>

"And these<WH428> wineskins<WH4997> which<WH834> we filled<WH4390> were new,<WH2319> and behold,<WH2009> they are torn;<WH1234> and these<WH428> our clothes<WH8008> and our sandals<WH5275> are worn<WH1086> out because<WH4480> of the very<WH3966> long<WH7231> journey.<WH1870>"
So the men<WH376> [of Israel] took<WH3947> some<WH4480> of their provisions,<WH9479> and did not ask<WH7592> for the counsel<WH6310> of the Lord.<WH3068>

And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> peace<WH7965> with them and made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them, to let them live;<WH2421> and the leaders<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> swore<WH7650> [an oath] to them.

And it came<WH1961> about at the end<WH7097> of three<WH7969> days<WH3117> after<WH310> they had made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with them, that they heard<WH8085> that they were neighbors<WH7138> and that they were living<WH3427> within<WH7130> their land.<WH7130>

Then the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> set<WH5265> out and came<WH935> to their cities<WH5892> on the third<WH7992> day.<WH3117> Now their cities<WH5892> [were] Gibeon<WH1391> and Chephirah<WH3716> and Beeroth<WH881> and Kiriath-jearim.

And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did not strike<WH5221> them because<WH3588> the leaders<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> had sworn<WH7650> to them by the Lord<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478> And the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> grumbled<WH9235> against<WH5921> the leaders.<WH5387>

But all<WH3605> the leaders<WH5387> said<WH559> to the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> "We have sworn<WH7650> to them by the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> and now<WH6258> we cannot<WH3201> <WH3808> touch<WH5060> them.
"This<WH2088> we will do<WH6213> to them, even let them live,<WH2421> lest<WH3808> wrath<WH7110> be upon us for the oath<WH7621> which<WH834> we swore<WH7650> to them."

And the leaders<WH5387> said<WH559> to them, "Let them live.<WH2421>" So they became<WH1961> hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the whole<WH3605> congregation,<WH5712> just<WH9201> as the leaders<WH5387> had spoken<WH1696> to them.

Then Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for them and spoke<WH1696> to them, saying,<WH559> "Why<WH4100> have you deceived<WH7411> us, saying,<WH559> 'We are very<WH3966> far<WH7350> from you,' when you are living<WH3427> within<WH7130> our land<WH7130>?

"Now<WH6258> therefore, you are cursed,<WH779> and you shall never<WH3808> cease<WH3772> being slaves,<WH5650> both hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the house<WH1004> of my God.<WH430>"

So they answered<WH6030> Joshua<WH3091> and said,<WH559> "Because<WH3588> it was certainly<WH5046> told<WH5046> your servants<WH5650> that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> had commanded<WH6680> His servant<WH5650> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> you all<WH3605> the land,<WH776> and to destroy<WH8045> all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> before<WH4480> <WH6440> you; therefore we feared<WH3372> greatly<WH3966> for our lives<WH5315> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of you, and have done<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing.<WH1697>
"And now<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> we are in your hands;<WH3027> do<WH6213> as it seems good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> in your sight<WH5869> to do<WH6213> to us."
Thus<WH3651> he did<WH6213> to them, and delivered<WH5337> them from the hands<WH3027> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and they did not kill<WH2026> them.

But Joshua<WH3091> made<WH5414> them that day<WH3117> hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH2404> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the congregation<WH5712> and for the altar<WH4196> of the Lord,<WH3068> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> He would choose.<WH977>
